name: iMemory
description:
iMemory - This is a logical game designed to train the memory and attention of the player.

You have to memorize in what places the correct cards are located, each subsequent level becomes more difficult than the previous one.Features:
  • Simple controls
  • Relaxing soundtrack.
  • Training your brain and attention.
  • Gameplay for children and adults.
Credits:
  • Programming: PlatSTUDIO && AFBIK Studio
  • Music and effects: zapsplat
